attributes.action: We need to reform the education system
attributes.background: Unemployment is rising. People are doing more academic subjects than practical ones. There's also a shortage of doctors and other practical jobs we should encourage people to do more practical labour and take apprenticeship

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to reform the education system.
